channel.title: Axiom on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in Axiom on Petfactory

item.title: Houdini - Axiom
item.description: s 28.42 Axiom Solver Axiom > Main > Solver Mode Traditional Traditional follows the exact steps of used by most fluid solvers Reflection Reflection is good at conserving energy in the sim, swirling motion will last longer. Reflection Single Step Less accurate but faster version of reflection (Default) Really no need to change from this Division Size Voxel div size, lower value means higher resolution Voxels Starting number of voxels.
